channel.title: [317] Barrows Help [317]
channel.description:
Ok im making a new barrows minigame. It look like the real runescape minigame of barrows. When you killed all the brothers you need to go to the chest. I know how to give someone items from its when he clicks. But i dont know how to give like:
Some time just ashes Some time some money and ashes Some time barrows Some time ashes and barrows,...
So can someone help me ?

item.title: [317] Barrows Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

set up new thing in item2.java

and where u get ur reward, put stuf like this

if (misc.random(5) == 1) {
addItem(item2.barrows(), 1);
}

id, something like that

Read full topic
